    • Method Detail

      • createStack

        public TutumStack createStack(String stackName,
                              List<TutumService> stackServices)
        Description copied from interface: Tutum
        Create a new stack

        API Ref

        Creates a new stack without starting it. Note that the JSON syntax is abstracted by both, the Tutum CLI and our UI, in order to use Stack YAML files

        HTTP REQUEST

        POST /api/v1/stack/

        Specified by:
        createStack in interface Tutum
        Parameters:
        stackName - A human-readable name for the stack, i.e. my-hello-world-stack
        stackServices - List of services belonging to the stack.
        Returns:
        a newly created stack

        Parameters:
        alias - the name of the link
        serviceFrom - the name of the service to link from
        serviceTo - the name of the service to link to

      • startService

        public TutumResponse startService(String uuid)
                           throws TutumException
        Description copied from interface: Tutum
        Starts a service

        API Ref

        Starts all containers in a stopped or partly running service.

        HTTP REQUEST

        POST /api/v1/service/(uuid)/start/

        Specified by:
        startService in interface Tutum
        Parameters:
        uuid - the id of the service you wish to start
        Returns:
        the response from Tutum if any
        Throws:
        TutumException - if something goes wrong

      • exec

        public TutumExecResponse exec(TutumContainer container,
                              String command)
                       throws TutumException
        Description copied from interface: Tutum
        Execute command inside a container

        API Ref

        Executes a command inside the specified running container, creating a bi-directional stream for the process' standard input and output

        HTTP REQUEST

        GET /v1/container/(uuid)/exec/

        NB: Synchronous call, asynchronous version is TODO
        Specified by:
        exec in interface Tutum
        Parameters:
        container - the container you wish to execute the command on.
        command - the command to execute
        Returns:
        the response from executing the command, upon termination
        Throws:
        TutumException - if something goes wrong

      • exec

        public TutumExecResponse exec(String uuid,
                              String command)
                       throws TutumException
        Description copied from interface: Tutum
        Execute command inside a container

        API Ref

        Executes a command inside the specified running container, creating a bi-directional stream for the process' standard input and output

        HTTP REQUEST

        GET /v1/container/(uuid)/exec/

        NB: Synchronous call, asynchronous version is TODO
        Specified by:
        exec in interface Tutum
        Parameters:
        uuid - the id the container you wish to execute the command on.
        command - the command to execute
        Returns:
        the response from executing the command, upon termination
        Throws:
        TutumException - if something goes wrong
